revised_title: Pyrophosphoric Acid and its Amides: Formation, Properties, and Reactions
tldr: The author investigates pyrophosphoric acid and its amides, exploring their formation, properties, and reactions. They discover different methods of creating these compounds, including the action of ammonia on phosphoric anhydride and oxychloride of phosphorus. The author also discusses the various properties and reactions of these amides, such as their solubility and ability to form salts. This research contributes to the understanding of phosphorus chemistry and the development of new compounds.
